raw_text: Distributional Similarity has been an active re search area for more than a decade (Hindle, 1990), (Ruge, 1992), (Grefenstette, 1994), (Lee, 1997), (Lin, 1998), (Dagan et al, 1999), (Weeds and Weir, 2003)

raw_text: As a case study, we used our evaluation methodology to compare four methods for learning entailment rules between predicates: DIRT (Lin and Pantel,2001), Cover (Weeds and Weir, 2003), BInc (Szpek tor and Dagan, 2008) and Berant et al (2010)
